msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides, almost regularly cut at the top, yet the upper part of the columnis broken. Some lacunae and a big damage at the bottom, yet they don't affect the text. kollesis at the middle of the papyrus. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated the new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the taxpayer.

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Sokmenis, son of Sokmenis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 230)
Pakysis, son of Panesneus, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 196)
Ptolemaios, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Satabous, mother Segathis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 218)
Orsenouphis the son, mother Soeris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 194)
Petheus alias Karanos, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Tasokmenis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 204)
Sarapion alias Sokrates, son of Achillas, grandson of Hatres, mother Tamaron (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 225)
Chairemon, son of Horos, grandson of Onnophris, mother Segathis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 247)
Horos the son, mother Stotoetis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 249)
Ptolemaios the other son (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 216)
Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 218)
Pakysis, son of Kalatytes, grandson of Heras, mother Segathis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 195)
Onnophris, son of Petheus,, grandson of Petheus, mother Ptolema (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)
Teos, son of Mysthes, grandson of Anchophis, mother Tanais (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 242)
Horos, son of Menandros, grandson of Anchophis, mother Soeris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 250)
Mystharion, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 188)
Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Heras (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 213)
Sarapion, son of Apollonios, grandson of Harpagathes, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 225)
Sabinus, son of Sisois, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Tapais (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 222)
Ptolemaios, son of Naaraus the elder, grandson of Theabennis, mother Tamaron (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 218)
Onnophris, son of Aunes, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thais (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 191)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: �ǣ(Column). 137;the 24th of the same (month);;Sokmenis, son of Sokmenis (Tauris dealer in purple);;{in the left margin: geometria for the 12th year 6 drachmas, 1.5 obols, surcharges 2.5 obols, the total 6 drachmas, 4 obols;;Pakysis, son of Panesneus, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tapetheus, the administrator fee 4 drachmas;;Ptolemaios, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Satabous, mother Segathis;;Past the age, watch-tower, 2 drachmas, 1 obol;;Orsenouphis the son, mother Soeris, the remaining the administrator fee;;Petheus alias Karanos, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Tasokmenis, the administrator fee 4 drachmas;;Sarapion alias Sokrates, son of Achillas, grandson of Hatres, mother Tamaron, 4 bronze drachmas, the remaining the administrator fee;;Chairemon, son of Horos, grandson of Onnophris, mother Segathis, the administrator fee 4 drachmas;;Horos the son, mother Stotoetis, the administrator fee 4 drachmas;;Ptolemaios the other son, the same mother, the administrator fee 4 drachmas;;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Thaesis, the remaining the administrator fee;;The total for the day 40 drachmas, 11 obols;;The 25th of the same (month);;Pakysis, son of Kalatytes, grandson of Heras, mother Segathis, 8bronze drachmas;;Onnophris, son of Petheus,, grandson of Petheus, mother Ptolema, the remaining the administrator fee;;Teos, son of Mysthes, grandson of Anchophis, mother Tanais, the administrator fee 8 drachmas;;Horos, son of Menandros, grandson of Anchophis, mother Soeris, the remaining the administrator fee;;Mystharion, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Thaesis, the administrator fee 28 obols;;Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Heras, the remaining the administrator;;Sarapion, son of Apollonios, grandson of Harpagathes, mother Thermouthis, the remaining the administrator fee;;Sabinus, son of Sisois, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Tapais, the administrator fee 4 drachmas;;Ptolemaios, son of Naaraus the elder, grandson of Theabennis, mother Tamaron, the administrator fee 4 drachmas;;Onnophris, son of Aunes, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thais, 4 obols, 4 bronze drachmas, 24 obols;;The total for the day 44 drachmas, 20 obols;;(Last third of column blank)
